```{r}
data <- read.csv("int_data.csv")
```

```{r}
dates <- as.Date(data$date, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
alior <- data$closes_alior
ing <- data$closes_ing
```

```{r}
plot(
  x = dates,
  y = alior,
  type = "l"
)
```

```{r}
plot(
  x = dates,
  y = ing,
  type = "l"
)
```

```{r}
hist(
  x = alior,
  freq = FALSE,
  breaks = 30
)
```

```{r}
hist(
  x = ing,
  freq = FALSE,
  breaks = 30
)
```
